cyclone.name: GORDON
cyclone.current_location: about 130 miles SSE of Mobile, Alabama
cyclone.trajectory: tracking northwest toward the north-central Gulf Coast, then curving north-northwest inland toward Arkansas/Missouri
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the Mississippi-Alabama border (north-central Gulf Coast)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm-surge and tropical-storm watches extend west of Shell Beach LA to the Mouth of the Mississippi River and east of Dauphin Island AL to Navarre FL
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane warnings from the Mouth of the Pearl River to the Alabama-Florida border; tropical-storm warnings west to Grand Isle LA and east to Okaloosa-Walton County line FL
weather_observation.impacted_coast: North-central Gulf Coast from southeast Louisiana through the western Florida Panhandle
weather_observation.wind: No significant tropical-storm-force winds expected at Jacksonville, FL
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected at Jacksonville, FL (Atlantic coast well outside surge envelope)
weather_observation.rainfall: Only isolated light outer-band showers possible; heavy rainfall core remains over Gulf Coast west of Jacksonville
